designLanguage: The MotherDuck design system emphasizes clarity and efficiency with a clean, professional aesthetic. It uses subtle shadows and rounded corners to create depth while maintaining readability. The color palette combines warm brand colors with neutral grays for a balanced, approachable look. Typography is clear and functional, prioritizing legibility across all screen sizes.

components.name: Button
components.description: Buttons communicate actions users can take. The primary button is used for the principal call to action.

components.name: Card
components.description: Cards group related content and actions. They provide a consistent container for displaying information.

components.name: Navigation
components.description: The main navigation provides consistent access to key sections of the site.
